mapper.select: SELECT EMP_PASSWORD FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_PASSWORD = #{checkpwd}

SELECT EMP.EMP_NO, EMP.EMP_NAME, EMP.EMP_GENDER, EMP.EMP_BIRTH, EMP.EMP_PHONE, EMP.EMP_EMAIL, EMP.EMP_ADDRESS, EMP.EMP_EMPLOYMENT, EMP.EMP_DETAILADDRESS, EMP.EMP_POSTCODE, EMP.EMP_PASSWORD, EMP.EMP_AUTH, EMP_PROFILE, POS.NM AS EMP_RANK, -- 직급명 가져오기 DC.DEPT_NAME AS DEPT_CODE, -- 부서명 EMP.CREATE_DATE, EMP.MODIFY_DATE, EMP.CREATER, EMP.MODIFIER, EMP.USE_YN, EMP.AC_NO, EMP.AC_BANK FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE EMP LEFT JOIN TBL_COMMON_CODE POS ON EMP.EMP_AUTH = POS.CD LEFT JOIN tbl_department DC ON EMP.DEPT_CODE = DC.DEPT_CODE ORDER BY EMP_NO DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE where ${condition} like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT EMP.EMP_NO, EMP.EMP_NAME, EMP.EMP_PHONE, EMP.EMP_EMAIL, POS.NM AS EMP_RANK, -- 직급명 가져오기 DC.DEPT_NAME AS DEPT_CODE, -- 부서명 EMP.CREATE_DATE FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE EMP LEFT JOIN TBL_COMMON_CODE POS ON EMP.EMP_AUTH = POS.CD LEFT JOIN TBL_DEPARTMENT DC ON EMP.DEPT_CODE = DC.DEPT_CODE WHERE emp.${condition} LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY EMP_NO DESC

SELECT EMP.EMP_NO, EMP.EMP_NAME, EMP.EMP_PHONE, EMP.EMP_EMAIL, EMP.EMP_PROFILE, EMP.EMP_BIRTH, EMP.AC_NO, EMP.AC_BANK, EMP.EMP_POSTCODE, EMP.EMP_ADDRESS, EMP.EMP_DETAILADDRESS, POS.NM AS EMP_RANK, -- 직급명 가져오기 DC.DEPT_NAME AS DEPT_CODE, -- 부서명 EMP.CREATE_DATE FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE EMP LEFT JOIN TBL_COMMON_CODE POS ON EMP.EMP_AUTH = POS.CD LEFT JOIN tbl_department DC ON EMP.DEPT_CODE = DC.DEPT_CODE WHERE EMP.EMP_NO = #{empNo}

SELECT EMP.EMP_NO, EMP.EMP_NAME, EMP.EMP_PHONE, EMP.EMP_EMAIL, POS.NM AS EMP_RANK, -- 직급명 가져오기 DC.DEPT_NAME AS DEPT_CODE, -- 부서명 EMP.CREATE_DATE FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE EMP LEFT JOIN TBL_COMMON_CODE POS ON EMP.EMP_AUTH = POS.CD LEFT JOIN tbl_department DC ON EMP.DEPT_CODE = DC.DEPT_CODE WHERE EMP.EMP_NO = #{empName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_EMPLOYEE ( EMP_NO, EMP_NAME, EMP_GENDER, EMP_BIRTH, EMP_EMAIL, EMP_PHONE, AC_NO, AC_BANK, EMP_ADDRESS, EMP_POSTCODE, EMP_DETAILADDRESS, EMP_PASSWORD, DEPT_CODE, EMP_PROFILE ) VALUES ( EMP_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{empName}, #{empGender}, #{empBirth}, #{empEmail}, #{empPhone}, #{acNo}, #{acBank}, #{empAddress}, #{empPostcode}, #{empDetailAddress}, 1234, #{deptCode}, #{empProfile} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_EMPLOYEE SET EMP_NAME = #{empName}, EMP_BIRTH = #{empBirth}, EMP_EMAIL = #{empEmail}, EMP_PHONE = #{empPhone}, AC_NO = #{acNo}, AC_BANK = #{acBank}, EMP_ADDRESS = #{empAddress}, EMP_POSTCODE = #{empPostcode}, EMP_DETAILADDRESS = #{empDetailAddress}, EMP_RANK = #{empRank}, EMP_PROFILE = #{empProfile} WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo}
UPDATE TBL_EMPLOYEE SET EMP_EMPLOYMENT = 'N' WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo}
mapper.select: SELECT S.salary_no, S.emp_no, e.emp_name, S.sal_base, S.sal_np, S.sal_hi, S.sal_ei, S.sal_net_salary FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE E JOIN TBL_SALARY S ON E.EMP_NO = S.EMP_NO WHERE E.EMP_NO = #{empNo}
